entities.name: Horcrux
entities.description: The Horcrux is a significant object in the story, and the protagonist is worried about it.

entities.name: Harry Potter (implied)
entities.description: Although not explicitly mentioned, the text implies that Harry Potter is the protagonist.

relationships.description: The Horcrux is something that Harry Potter is trying to steal back.
There are other Horcruxes out there, but the protagonist does not know where they are.
